meanings.definition: In a manner that involves the use of animatronics.
meanings.sent1: The dinosaur moved animatronically at the theme park.
meanings.sent2: The robot dog wagged its tail animatronically.
meanings.sent3: The animatronically dancing bear brought smiles to the children's faces.
meanings.sent4: The animatronically controlled puppet seemed almost alive.
meanings.sent5: The animatronically operated dragon breathed fire on the screen.

meanings.definition: Pertaining to or characteristic of animatronics.
meanings.sent1: The animatronically designed robot amazed the audience.
meanings.sent2: The animatronically enhanced show was a hit with the visitors.
meanings.sent3: The animatronically decorated cake looked too perfect to eat.
meanings.sent4: Her animatronically precise movements on stage captivated everyone.
meanings.sent5: The animatronically themed ride took riders on an exciting adventure.
